index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF LICENSES AND CONSUMER AFFAIRS
summary: AN ORDINANCE correcting unintentional omissions in amendatory Ordinance 107776, relating to transferring certain examination functions from the Civil Service Department to the Department of Licenses and Consumer Affairs, amending Section 6 of Ordinance 73223, Section 5 of Ordinance 84297, Sections 4 and 11 of Ordinance 94465, Sections 133 -- 137, 140, 141, 143 and 144 of Ordinance 48022, and repealing Ordinance 107776.
